rules_text:
Up to one target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Up to one target creature you don't control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Target opponent sacrifices a creature. Up to one target creature you control assimilates that card.
You get an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, return that card to its owner's hand.”
special_text:
[+1]: Up to one target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Up to one target creature you don't control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
[-2]: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. Up to one target creature you control assimilates that card.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, return that card to its owner's hand.”
notes: fluffy: it—>that card, it—>that card in ult as well, your—>its owner's
